short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IAM shouldn't be the only tab with a unique favicon!  This sets favicons for many AWS services, so your tabs make more sense.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension sets the correct favicon for a bunch of AWS services, so it's easier to see at a glance what all your tabs are for.  Over 100 favicons are included, with more on the way!

And it doesn't read your browsing history (like some other favicon extensions).

A note:  This specific version of my extension will only work on AWS in China (amazonaws.cn).  And because I can't create an account there, there's no way for me to test this but it's an exact copy of https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/aws-favicon-update/ohloajnmmkniehhbmjakbejnomonmijc so hopefully it will work well.

If this little extension has made your life easier, the tip jar can be found here: https://www.paypal.me/JB4GDI/
